title: (x) "Blend de Selección" wine label - Trajan, Ministry Script {Stephen}
content:
Any help with this would be appreciated. I’m trying to ID the serif font that is used in this image.. the font in the words “Partida Limitada, Cabernet - Merlot”, etc.

My apologies for the small sample but this is all I can find. Thanks for any help that you can provide.

Josh

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119063106im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture-2c_4920.jpg)

 [‹ number - font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119063106/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41788 "Go to previous forum topic") [!!ringling brothers!! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119063106/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41771 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jjdewtt

comments.content: My first guess is [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119063106/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/trajan_pro_ot/?sample_text=cabernet%20merlot). The script is [Ministry Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119063106/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000149).
Thanks very much, Stephen! Good eyes.
Thanks very much, Stephen! Good eyes.
